Name: Kaagman & Kortekaas
Review Text: Michelin guide rated....Wow what a taste experience. Exotic flavours, iconic dishes all works of culinary artistic Genius and absolutely delicious. The atmosphere and Service was 5 Star. If you are looking to stretch your taste Buds outside ‚Ä¶

Name: Kaagman & Kortekaas
Review Text: One of the best restaurants in Amsterdam. We go here as often as we can and always get surprised with the variety of the dishes which follows seasons available ingredients. Ask for the wine paring, you will not be disappointed.

Name: Kaagman & Kortekaas
Review Text: Excellent experience. We had the five course dinner with wine pairing. Every dish absolutely amazed us. The distinguishing factor in each meal regarded the surprising factor of unknown (but tasty) ingredients and local products. Our host ‚Ä¶

Name: Kaagman & Kortekaas
Review Text:
Wonderful food. Great ambiance. Very helpful and professional staff. Acoustics are not too great though, takes effort to hear the person in front of you.
Prices are very acceptable for the quality of the dishes and wines. Definitely recommendable!

Name: Kaagman & Kortekaas

Review Text:

Highly recommended!
